mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT IFNULL(server, '未命名服务') AS server FROM cat_api_path ORDER BY IFNULL(server, '未命名服务')
SELECT DISTINCT IFNULL(group_name, '未命名分组') AS groupName FROM cat_api_path where server = #{server} ORDER BY IFNULL(group_name, '未命名分组')

SELECT cpp.path, cpp.server, cpp.white_list, IFNULL(cpp.name, cpp.path) AS name, cpp.group_name, cpp.create_time, cpp.update_time, IF(IF(#{roleId} = 1, 1, crp.api_path) IS NULL, 0, 1) roleBind FROM cat_api_path cpp LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM cat_role_api WHERE role_id = #{roleId} AND server = #{server}) crp ON cpp.path = crp.api_path WHERE cpp.server = #{server} AND cpp.group_name = #{groupName}
